synopsis.text:
Naoki Irie, a tall, handsome, and exceptionally intelligent young man, has captured the heart of the clumsy, underachieving high school student, Kotoko Aihara. Despite their stark contrasts, Kotoko's feelings for Naoki have only grown stronger since her first day of high school. Unfortunately, Naoki's disdain for those he deems unintelligent has left Kotoko's love unrequited.

When an unexpected earthquake destroys Kotoko's home, she finds herself living under the same roof as Naoki, thanks to her father's friendship with Naoki's father. Seizing this golden opportunity, Kotoko remains hopeful that her proximity to Naoki will help her win his heart.

As they navigate their new living situation, Kotoko's unwavering optimism and relentless pursuit of Naoki's affection lead to a series of hilarious and heartwarming moments. With the support of eccentric friends and Naoki's meddlesome mother, Kotoko embarks on a journey to bridge the gap between herself and the boy she admires. Will her determination and newfound closeness to Naoki be enough to melt his icy exterior and make him see her in a new light? Join Kotoko on her quest to capture the heart of the brilliant Naoki Irie in this delightful and engaging anime.
